short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translates and displays Khan Academy videos on Youtube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn from Khan Academy videos in different languages through engaging translated audio, not just difficult-to-read, auto-generated captions. 
Or, contribute by fixing occasional mistranslated sentences to help improve other's learning experiences through mass collaboration.

V4.1 - More videos added, new UI, video list of what videos are available
